transcripts.text: The whole Kenny versus Spenny phenomenon was just as much of a shock to us.  Before that, we were broke, living in  L.A.,  trying to sell scripts, hustling everyone and anyone we could find.  No one in Hollywood was safe.
You shouldn't do television interviews while you have something in your mouth.
That's true.  It was right around that time that Spenny and I realized we shouldn't be selling our scripts.  We should be selling ourselves.  And that's when things really blew up.
Ladies and gentlemen.  Let me tell you who's on the program this evening.  From Kenny vs.  Spenny, please welcome...
Kenny Hotz.  Kenny Hotz.
Kenny Hotz.  Kenny Hotz and Spencer Rice.

The concept of the show was really simple.  Two best friends competing in insane weekly challenges.  And whoever loses the challenge is subjected to a humiliation.  But you know, when you have a camera in your face every day for ten years... Ow!  Don't!  Don't touch me!  I'm serious!  It creates problems in relationships.  Idiot!  Driving Spenny crazy is what made us famous, but Spenny being crazy is what hurt our relationship.

I have, I think, a minor depression, and it's mostly situational.  And the truth is, um, Kenny is partly responsible.  He is part of the situation, but not the entire situation, and I keep my private life private.
Yeah, maybe I'm partly responsible.
All right, well, this is... You two are trapped in your own private hell, then.  This is fascinating.
I don't know whether he stopped being friends with me or I stopped being friends with him, but he just split.  Just abandoned me and left me alone.  No more Kenny and Spenny.
I spoke to a lawyer.
I need help.  You claim bankruptcy.  You're destitute.  You're living in a rent.
So I made a business mistake.
I've been protecting you my entire life.
Every time you don't listen to me, you get screwed.
I can't believe that we're filming this.
My name's Candy Finnegan.  I'm a counselor.  I'm going to be perfectly honest with you because this is my job.  This is a mess.  So how are you feeling?
Do you think I can knock you out with one punch?
Probably.  I apologize for not appreciating you.
I love you.
I love you.  I mean, I said I love you.
I'm trying to heal our relationship.  I have a great idea.  Let's shoot the show.  I'll cut it together, and I'll sell it to the broadcaster.
You're a good friend.  The old show literally destroyed our friendship, and it was sad.
I totally need this.  I was so burnt out from the kids.  If I'm going to stay in the biz, this is my last chance.  Shut up!
Woo!  Bro, I'll be showing out, man.

Kenny and I, we're really getting along well.  It actually makes me feel good.  If this is a new chapter, let's turn the page.  He's like a brother I never wanted.  Sometimes I hate his guts, but deep down, I love him.  It's not going to be like last time.  He has changed.
